package.name: Validate_ptBR
package.description: Package containes locale validation for ptBR such as: * Postal Code * CNPJ * CPF

release.notes: - Split from Validate into independent package - CS fixes - Fix Bug #3668, usage of $$foo were it should have been $foo - BC break! postalCode unified between countries (name wise), now all postcode validation funcs are named postalCode
